title: Constantly crashing at start of game

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: My game keeps crashing every time i try to launch in game, please see the attached error message.

replies.body: it looks like you might have a bad driver or hardware issue that can't load the game properly.  I suggest using the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help tune up your PC and make sure things are smoothed out.  Hope it helps!
